system.availability: Can spend 10 minutes to be distilled with +20 Trade (Chymist) Test. Requires +0 Chem-Use Test to Administer. If done so, Tests to detect in food and water have -30. If injested, character must make -20 Toughness Test or suffer -20 to Opposed Interaction Tests for one minute, +1 minute per DoF.
system.cost: Root of the Aletheias Plant, can be distilled into a tasteless substance that lowers a person's inhibitions, becoming more likely to confess things.
